results.title: Effective Control of Supraventricular Tachycardia in Neonates May Requires Combination Pharmacologic Therapy
results.text_hl: In the present study, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ was used as maintenance therapy in four @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with re-entry @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@.

results.title: Safety of preoperative carvedilol in a patient with recent atenolol-induced pheochromocytoma crisis and cardiomyopathy: A case report
results.text_hl: She developed @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive crisis@@@ with @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D011654 @@@acute pulmonary edema@@@ resulting in @DISEASE_Respiratory_Insufficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D012131 @@@respiratory failure@@@ after administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ to treat @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@.

citations.NLM: Wannachalee T, Chunharojrith P. Safety of preoperative carvedilol in a patient with recent atenolol-induced pheochromocytoma crisis and cardiomyopathy: A case report Ann Med Surg (Lond). 2020 Dec;60():360-364. PMID: 33224491

results.title: Heart Rate Control during Experimental Sepsis in Mice: Comparison of Ivabradine and beta-Blockers.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: As compared with placebo (601 beats/min [547 to 612]), @CHEMICAL_Ivabradine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077550 @@@ivabradine@@@ (447 beats/min [430 to 496]) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (482 beats/min [412 to 505]) blunted @DISEASE_Sepsis @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@ assessed by transthoracic echocardiography in awake animals (P < 0.001 and P = 0.004, respectively).

citations.NLM: Bedet A, Voiriot G, Ternacle J, Marcos E, Adnot S, Derumeaux G, Mekontso Dessap A. Heart Rate Control during Experimental Sepsis in Mice: Comparison of Ivabradine and beta-Blockers. Anesthesiology. 2020 Feb;132(2):321-329. PMID: 31939847
citations.BibTeX: @article{31939847, title={Heart Rate Control during Experimental Sepsis in Mice: Comparison of Ivabradine and beta-Blockers.}, author={Bedet A and Voiriot G and Ternacle J and Marcos E and Adnot S and Derumeaux G and Mekontso Dessap A}, journal={Anesthesiology}, volume={132}, number={2}, pages={321-329}}

results.title: SUCCESSFUL ABLATION OF CONCEALED ACCESSORY PATHWAY MEDIATED SUPRAVENTRICULAR TACHYCARDIA IN A 5-YEAR-OLD CHILD WITH EBSTEIN ANOMALY.
results.text_hl: Tricuspid annulus was mapped during @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@. The earliest atrial signals appeared in the posteroseptal region of the valve, mechanical blocking of the @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@ was recorded in that region, and early fractionated signal was present during ventricular retrograde pacing.

citations.NLM: Krmek N, Jegdić V, Rode M. SUCCESSFUL ABLATION OF CONCEALED ACCESSORY PATHWAY MEDIATED SUPRAVENTRICULAR TACHYCARDIA IN A 5-YEAR-OLD CHILD WITH EBSTEIN ANOMALY. Acta Clin Croat. 2024 Apr;63(1):197-202. PMID: 39959329

results.title: Resistance to Thyroid Hormone Beta in a Patient Born to a Mother With Undiagnosed Graves' Disease
results.text_hl: ...Treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and supplemental feeding improved her @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@ and @DISEASE_Growth_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D006130 @@@growth delay@@@.

results.title: A Novel THRbeta Variant in a Child With Resistance to Thyroid Hormone beta: Diagnostic and Therapeutic Challenges.
results.text_hl: Clinical and biochemical findings were consistent with @DISEASE_Thyroid_Hormone_Resistance_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D018382 @@@RTHbeta@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ therapy was initiated to manage @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@ with favorable response.This case highlights the potential for misdiagnosis of @DISEASE_Thyroid_Hormone_Resistance_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D018382 @@@RTHbeta@@@ as TSHoma and underscores the value of genetic testing in differentiating the two.

citations.NLM: Gürpınar G, Aracı DG. A Novel THRbeta Variant in a Child With Resistance to Thyroid Hormone beta: Diagnostic and Therapeutic Challenges. J Clin Res Pediatr Endocrinol. 2025 Sep 17;():. PMID: 40960072

results.title: Ventricular pre-excitation in cats: 17 cases.
results.text_hl: Nine (9/17) @SPECIES_9685 @@@cats@@@ had @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachyarrhythmias@@@: 7/9 @SPECIES_9685 @@@cats@@@ had narrow QRS complex @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@ and 2/9 @SPECIES_9685 @@@cats@@@ had wide QRS complex @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@.

results.title: Cytoskeletal disarray increases arrhythmogenic vulnerability during sympathetic stimulation in a model of hypertrophic cardiomyopathy.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@Arrhythmias@@@ were attenuated with the beta-blocker @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and protein kinase A inhibitor PKI.

results.title: Comparative evaluation of atenolol and clonidine premedication on cardiovascular response to nasal speculum insertion during trans-sphenoid surgery for resection of pituitary adenoma: A prospective, randomised, double-blind, controlled study
results.text_hl: Oral @CHEMICAL_Clonidine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003000 @@@clonidine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ effectively attenuate @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@ as well as @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ without causing postoperative sedation.
